markdownRemark.html:
Now there’s a pretty sweet way of looking at what’s happening on your server, I’ve picked this tip up from watching SHanselmans MS Stack Of Love (recommended watch) @ MIX11 this year.

Here’s how, (pardon the screenshot file sizes as usual ..)

  1. Create an application

  1. Add a package

  1. Search online for glimpse and install

  1. Add at least one Trace to demo an additional Glimpse feature

  1. Fire up your app and go to /Glimpse/Config, and Turn Glimpse On

  1. Click on the beady little eye on the bottom right corner of your webpage

  1. Voilá
